title: User Login with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that users can successfully log in with valid username and password
preconditions: User account exists in the system
expectedResult: User is redirected to dashboard with welcome message
actualResult: User successfully logged in and redirected to dashboard

title: Create New Ticket with All Required Fields
description: Test the creation of a new support ticket with all mandatory fields filled
preconditions: User is logged in and has ticket creation permissions
expectedResult: New ticket is created and appears in ticket list with correct details
actualResult: Ticket created successfully with all fields populated correctly

executionHistory.notes: All fields saved correctly, ticket ID generated

title: Responsive Design on Mobile Devices
description: Verify that the application displays correctly on mobile devices
preconditions: Access to mobile device or mobile emulator
expectedResult: All elements should be properly sized and accessible on mobile
actualResult: Navigation menu overlaps content on screen sizes below 375px

executionHistory.notes: Menu overlap issue found on iPhone SE screen size

title: API Response Time Performance
description: Test API endpoints response times under normal load conditions
preconditions: API endpoints are available and accessible
expectedResult: All API endpoints should respond within 500ms
actualResult: Average response time: 287ms, all within acceptable limits

executionHistory.notes: All endpoints performing well within SLA

title: Data Validation on Ticket Form
description: Verify that form validation works correctly for ticket creation
preconditions: User has access to ticket creation form
testSteps: Attempt to submit form with empty title
Submit form with description exceeding character limit
Test special characters in input fields
expectedResult: Appropriate validation errors should display for invalid inputs

title: File Upload Functionality
description: Test file upload feature for ticket attachments
preconditions: File upload feature is implemented and accessible
testSteps: Select various file types (PDF, JPG, PNG, DOC)
expectedResult: Files should upload successfully with proper validation
actualResult: Upload feature currently disabled due to server configuration

title: Search Functionality Accuracy
description: Verify that search returns accurate and relevant results
preconditions: Database contains sample tickets for searching
testSteps: Enter exact ticket ID in search
expectedResult: Search should return relevant results quickly and accurately
actualResult: Search functionality working as expected with fast response times

title: User Permission Levels
description: Test different user permission levels and access restrictions
preconditions: Multiple user accounts with different permission levels exist
testSteps: Verify admin can access all features
Verify user cannot access admin functions
expectedResult: Users should only access features appropriate to their permission level
actualResult: Permission system working correctly, unauthorized access properly blocked

title: Dark Mode Toggle Functionality
description: Test the dark mode toggle feature across all pages
expectedResult: Dark mode should apply consistently across all pages and save preference
actualResult: Dark mode working perfectly with consistent styling and preference saving

executionHistory.notes: Dark mode toggle works smoothly on all pages

title: Ticket Status Workflow
description: Verify ticket status transitions follow business rules
preconditions: Test tickets exist in various statuses
testSteps: Assign ticket to user (should become 'In Progress')
expectedResult: Ticket statuses should follow defined workflow rules

title: Email Notification System
description: Test email notifications for various ticket events
preconditions: Email service is configured and test email accounts are available
testSteps: Verify emails are sent to appropriate recipients
expectedResult: Email notifications should be sent for all configured events
actualResult: Assignment emails not being sent, other notifications working

title: Database Backup Recovery
description: Test database backup and recovery procedures
preconditions: Backup system is in place and test environment is available
expectedResult: Data should be fully restored with no corruption or loss
actualResult: Backup and restore completed successfully with full data integrity

executionHistory.notes: Backup and restore procedures working perfectly

title: Cross-Browser Compatibility
description: Verify application works correctly across different browsers
preconditions: Access to multiple browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge)
expectedResult: Application should work consistently across all major browsers
actualResult: Application works well across all tested browsers with minor Safari styling differences

executionHistory.notes: Good compatibility, minor Safari CSS adjustments needed

title: Load Testing with High User Volume
description: Test application performance under high concurrent user load
preconditions: Load testing tools are available and test environment can handle high load
testSteps: Configure load testing tool for 100 concurrent users
Monitor response times and error rates
Analyze performance metrics and identify bottlenecks
expectedResult: Application should handle high load without significant performance degradation

title: Security Vulnerability Scan
preconditions: Security scanning tools are available and authorized for use
testSteps: Verify HTTPS implementation and certificate validity
expectedResult: No critical security vulnerabilities should be found
actualResult: Waiting for security team approval to run penetration tests
